attributes.action: stop spending on the Olympics and divert the money to the N.H.S. and aid to impoverished countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Billions of pounds are being spent on the London Olympics - how much will the total turn out to be? - all for a few weeks of sporting skill. They are an unnecessary luxury; but we NEED the N.H.S. and, even more so, impoverished countries need our aid very badly.  How many life-saving drugs, currently unapproved by N.I.C.E., could we afford if we weren't spending on these; and how much more could we do to Make Poverty History?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/OlympicsAthens/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
